termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions:
items: All members making their first deposit are eligible for this promotion.
Members need to deposit into the sports wallet to claim the bonus.
The promotion is subject to availability and applies to all mentioned sports providers.
The bonus will be credited to the sports provider wallet of your choice after a successful transfer.
Unless otherwise specified, the bonus is valid for 30 days after issuance.
Any bets that are void, tied, or canceled, or placing opposing bets on the same event, will not count toward the wagering requirement.
Members who have claimed a specific provider promotion may not transfer to that provider again during the promotion period unless they meet the wagering requirements or the promotion is canceled.
All customer offers are limited to one per person, household, and address.
This promotion cannot be used in conjunction with other BK8 promotions.
BK8 reserves the right to modify, cancel, suspend, or terminate the promotion and/or change the promotion terms without prior notice.
Participating members must accept and comply with all the above terms as well as all the terms on the BK8 website.
BK8 general terms and conditions apply.

news.title: BK8 x Manny Pacquiao
news.description: On December 1, 2023, BK8 announced that the famous Filipino boxing legend Manny Pacquiao has become the brand ambassador. Pacquiao, a 12-time world champion across eight different divisions, will help elevate BK8‚Äôs brand presence.

news.title: BK8 x Aston Villa
news.description: BK8 has signed a multi-year partnership agreement with Aston Villa Football Club, making BK8 the club‚Äôs main partner and front-of-shirt sponsor for the 2023/2024 season. Additionally, BK8 actively participates in local charity events.

news.title: BK8 x Burnley Football Club
news.description: Since 2022, BK8 has been the official Asian betting partner of Burnley Football Club. In the 2023/2024 season, BK8 expanded this partnership further by becoming the club‚Äôs official training kit partner.

news.title: BK8 x BWF
news.description: BK8 is the official betting sponsor for selected HSBC BWF World Tour events in 2024. This strategic partnership will receive extensive international exposure.
